1.title: AUTO FINANCING
1.body: Guaranteed lower rates. Tap here to talk to a banker.

2.title: HOT STOCK MINUTE
2.body: Live video from the NASDAQ market site. Prepares you for trading day live streams.

4.title: CONSOLIDATE YOUR DEBT
